Reason: The 'commitlog_sync' configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts the performance and reliability of the system by determining the type of CommitLog service to use and how often it is synced. Depending on the selected option (periodic, batch, or group), different CommitLog service executors are instantiated and used, leading to notable performance variations at the system level. The triggering frequency and size impact of the configuration also play a significant role in determining system performance, making it crucial for overall system efficiency.
